name: Raboot

evolution.description: Raboot can evolve into Cinderace at level 14 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Rabbit Pokémon. It kicks berries right off the branches of trees and then juggles them with its feet, practicing its footwork.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Libero
abilities.description: While executing a move, this Pokémon's type becomes the same as that of the move and may add its STAB bonus to it.
